thread.title: A Night in New York City
thread.title_full: A Night in New York City - Review of Courtyard by Marriott New York Manhattan/Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dolores C
title: A Night in New York City
text: Tickets to Hamilton, a good reason to stay in the city. We waited so long and it was my birthday. Arrived mid afternoon. The room was lovely. Valet parking made it easy to get around on foot. Absolutely near restaurants and theaters. Snow in the morning so our day was curtailed but we were able to start off with a nice breakfast.
